# Data Scientist. Machine Learning and AI Enthusiast.
I am Min Min, a data scientist with a keen interest in data science and machine learning techniques. I graduated with a bachelor in Physics and masters in Statistics from the National University of Singapore. I have experience in data analysis, machine learning, and statistical modeling. I am passionate about using data to solve real-world problems and to make data-driven decisions. I am proficient in R, Python, and SQL. I am also familiar with machine learning techniques and applied machine learning algorithms for predictive analytics. I am currently working as a data scientist in a startup company.


My interests in data science and machine learning are broad, and I am always looking for opportunities to learn and grow. I am open to collaborations and new projects. Please feel free to contact me if you have any questions or would like to discuss potential collaborations.
